title: Refine meditation session controls and pre-med layout

requirements.text: Move the meditation guide container to the bottom of PreMeditationPage, maintaining its current structure with the 'More details' button centered at the bottom of the container

quotes: in pre med page, put meditation guide container at the bottom of the page, instead like it is right now, at the top. Keep structure all the same, more details button should be at the bottom of meditation guide container centered.

acceptanceCriteria: Meditation guide container appears at the bottom of PreMeditationPage
'More details' button remains centered at the bottom of the meditation guide container
Container structure and content remain unchanged

requirements.text: Add a hover-only glow effect to the pause/play button on the meditation session page, using the existing theme color

quotes: make pause/play round circle button glow, and change to main color of the webpage

acceptanceCriteria: Pause/play button shows glow effect only when hovered
Glow effect uses the main color from the existing theme
No glow effect when not hovering

requirements.text: Fix the pause/play button to control audio playback in addition to the timer, so pausing stops both the audio and timer

quotes: pause/play button currently doesn't stop audio, it only stops the timer

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking pause stops both the meditation audio and timer
Clicking play resumes both the audio and timer from where they were paused

requirements.text: Place time control (audio scrubber allowing navigation to any point) and volume control inputs in a themed container on the meditation session page with clear indicators, including a percentage display for volume

quotes: Put time control and volume control inputs in container with UI fitting theme. Controls should have indication, like volume control, what is the % of a volume
I mean the input, which exists already in that page, like a youtube video player, where user can navigate through any video part manually, but here, user can only control time

acceptanceCriteria: Time control scrubber allows users to navigate to any point in the meditation audio
Volume control displays current volume as a percentage
Both controls are placed in a single container styled to match the app theme
Controls have clear visual indicators of their current state

requirements.text: Adjust timer text color on the meditation session page to be white/light in dark theme and black/dark in light theme

quotes: currently, the timer has white color, keep that white/light color for dark theme, and black/dark color for light theme

acceptanceCriteria: Timer displays in white or light color when dark theme is active
Timer displays in black or dark color when light theme is active
Timer text remains clearly readable in both themes

constraints: Use only the existing theme colors; do not introduce new color values
Maintain the current structure of the meditation guide container when repositioning it
Preserve existing audio scrubber functionality while enhancing controls
nonGoals: Changing the meditation guide content or steps
Modifying the pause/play button shape beyond ensuring it's circular
Adding new audio features beyond pause/play control and scrubbing
Redesigning the overall meditation session page layout
